comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: History of this ship can be found in White Wings, published 1924. Sunk with 1000 bales of wool on board. Reconditioned and put back into service afterwards.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called CityScape Dunedin, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
